subsection.leadIn: This section applies to any year—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: to which section 4 applies; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: 70% of the target fund size for which is greater than the balance of the Fund as at the specified date of the immediately preceding year. (Amended L.N. 107 of 2006)

subsection.content: A surcharge is payable by a Scheme member for any year to which this section applies.

Subject to section 6, the amount of surcharge payable by a Scheme member for any year is a specified portion of the amount of build-up levy that would have been payable by the Scheme member for that year in accordance with section 3(5) as if section 3 applied to that year.

subsection.leadIn: The aggregate amount of surcharges payable by all Scheme members for any year is—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: the difference between—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: the aggregate amount of build-up levies that would have been payable by all Scheme members for that year in accordance with section 3(5) as if section 3 applied to that year; and

subparagraph.name: ii

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: 30% of the amount by which the target fund size for that year exceeds the balance of the Fund as at the specified date of the immediately preceding year, (Amended L.N. 107 of 2006)

subsection.def: In this section, specified portion (指明部分), in relation to the amount of build-up levy that would have been payable for a year, means the portion that the aggregate amount of surcharges payable by all Scheme members for that year, calculated in accordance with subsection (4), bears to the aggregate amount of build-up levies that would have been payable by all Scheme members for that year, calculated in accordance with subsection (4)(a)(i).

section.name: s6
section.heading: Calculation of contribution for new Scheme members

subsection.name: 1A
subsection.content: This section applies to a Scheme member that becomes a member of the Scheme by virtue of section 12(3) of this Ordinance on or after the commencement* of this Schedule. (Added L.N. 107 of 2006)

subsection.leadIn: The amount of contribution payable by a Scheme member for the year in which it becomes a member of the Scheme— (Amended L.N. 107 of 2006)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: shall be calculated on the basis of the amount of relevant deposits maintained with the Scheme member as at the date it becomes a member of the Scheme; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: is that proportion of the amount of projected full-year contribution for that year that the number of days during which the Scheme member is a member of the Scheme in that year bears to 365.

subsection.content: If a Scheme member becomes a member of the Scheme after the specified date in any particular year, the amount of contribution payable for the subsequent year shall be calculated on the basis of the amount of relevant deposits maintained with the Scheme member as at the date it becomes a member of the Scheme.

In this section, projected full-year contribution (預計全年供款), in relation to a year in which a Scheme member becomes a member of the Scheme, means the amount of contribution that would have been payable by the Scheme member if that Scheme member had been a member of the Scheme during the whole of that year.

section.name: s7
section.heading: Minimum amount of contribution
section.leadIn: Notwithstanding anything in this Schedule, if the amount of contribution payable by a Scheme member for any year is less than $50,000, a minimum contribution equal in amount to that proportion of $50,000 that— (Amended L.N. 107 of 2006)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: in the case of the start-up year—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: where the Scheme member becomes a member of the Scheme before the commencement* of this Schedule, the number of days during which this Schedule is in operation in that year bears to 365;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: where the Scheme member becomes a member of the Scheme on or after the commencement of this Schedule, the number of days during which the Scheme member is a member of the Scheme in that year bears to 365; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in the case of any other year, the number of days during which the Scheme member is a member of the Scheme in that year bears to 365,

section.continued: is payable by the Scheme member for that year.

subsection.content: A rebate shall be made by the Board in any year if 115% of the target fund size for that year is smaller than the balance of the Fund as at the specified date of the immediately preceding year. (Amended L.N. 107 of 2006)

For any year in which a rebate is required to be made by the Board, the amount of rebate payable to a Scheme member is such portion of the aggregate amount of rebates payable to all Scheme members in that year, calculated in accordance with subsection (3), that the amount of net contribution by the Scheme member during the relevant period bears to the aggregate of the amount of net contribution by each of the Scheme members during the same period.

The aggregate amount of rebates payable to all Scheme members in any particular year is 30% of the amount by which the balance of the Fund as at the specified date of the immediately preceding year exceeds the target fund size for that particular year. (Amended L.N. 107 of 2006)

subsection.leadIn: In this section—
subsection.def: amount of net contribution (供款淨額), in relation to a Scheme member during a period, means the amount of contribution paid by the Scheme member during the period less the amount of rebate received by the Scheme member during that period;

relevant period (有關期間) means the period of 10 years immediately preceding the year in which the rebate is required to be made by the Board or the period since the commencement* of this Schedule, whichever is the shorter.

subsection.content: A proportion of the contribution paid by a Scheme member for the year in which it ceases to be a member of the Scheme shall be refunded to that Scheme member.

The amount to be refunded is that proportion of the contribution that the number of days within the relevant period in the year bears to the number of days within the contribution period in that year. (Amended L.N. 107 of 2006)

subsection.leadIn: In this section—

def.name: ContributionPeriod
def.leadIn: contribution period (供款期間)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.leadIn: in relation to the start-up year—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: in the case where the Scheme member becomes a member of the Scheme before the commencement* of this Schedule, means the period during which this Schedule is in operation in that year; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: in the case where the Scheme member becomes a member of the Scheme on or after the commencement of this Schedule, means the period that begins on the date on which the Scheme member becomes a member of the Scheme and expires on 31 December of that year;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: in relation to any other year—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: in the case where the Scheme member is a member of the Scheme on 1 January of that year, means the period that begins on 1 January and expires on 31 December of that year; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: in the case where the Scheme member becomes a member of the Scheme after 1 January of that year, means the period that begins on the date on which the Scheme member becomes a member of the Scheme and expires on 31 December of that year;

subsection.def: relevant period (有關期間), in relation to a year, means the period that begins on the date on which a Scheme member ceases to be a member of the Scheme and expires on 31 December of that year. (Added L.N. 107 of 2006)
